subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Iran to attend regional summit, Iraq says

04/29/07 08:31 AM, EDT
Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said Sunday that his government will attend a major regional conference on Iraq set for this week in Egypt, the Iraqi prime minister's office announced.
